author: Patrick Buchanan
title: The Real Presidential Campaign: Trump Versus the Coronavirus
description: In order for Biden to have a shot, Trump will have to come up short on the pandemic. The post The Real Presidential Campaign: Trump Versus the Coronavirus appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
In order for Biden to have a shot, Trump will have to come up short on the pandemic.This is the question that is going to dominate the election: How did you perform in the great crisis?”
So says GOP Congressman Tom Cole of Oklahoma in yesterday’s New York Ti… [+4734 chars]
